source.name: Page Comprehension
source.instructions: **What is the primary goal of this lesson?**

answers.answer: To use GPT-3 to generate a blog post about a pizza shop.
To create a text file that allows users to input whatever they want as a prompt for the GPT-3 API.
To use the GPT-3 API to classify items into categories.
To automate the process of summarizing long articles with GPT-3.

source.guidance: In this lesson, the primary goal is to recreate the box, which means building a text file that can interface with the GPT-3 API. The user should be able to input any prompt they want in this text file, and GPT-3 will then generate a response based on this prompt. This goal is to create a user-friendly program that can be easily utilized for various tasks, such as generating natural language text, automating customer support tasks, generating technical documentation, and more.
